title: Part One: The Man Who Invented Fascism
itunes:title: Part One: The Man Who Invented Fascism
description:
Robert is joined by Shereen Lani Younes to discuss the creator of Fascism, Gabriele D’Annunzio.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The Writer, Seducer, Aviator, Proto-Fascist, Megalomaniac Prince Who Shaped Modern Italy
  2. Gabriele d'Annunzio: Poet, Seducer, and Preacher of War
  3. A MAN OF MANY PARTS: GABRIELE D’ANNUNZIO
  4. The Randy Dandy
  5. Inventor of Fascism
  6. An Irishman’s Diary on Gabriele D’Annunzio – the ‘John the Baptist of Fascism’ and would-be IRA quartermaster
  7. Trump Before Trump
  8. The Pike: Gabriele D'Annunzio – Poet, Seducer & Preacher of War by Lucy Hughes-Hallett – review
